001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
006import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
008import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
009
010import com.commercetools.api.client.ProjectApiRoot;
011import com.commercetools.api.defaultconfig.ApiRootBuilder;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
013import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
014import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
015import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
016
017import io.sphere.sdk.client.*;
018import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpRequest;
019import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpResponse;
020import io.sphere.sdk.json.JsonException;
021import io.sphere.sdk.json.SphereJsonUtils;
022import io.sphere.sdk.models.SphereException;
023import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
024import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.ClientCredentials;
025
026public class CompatSphereClient extends AutoCloseableService implements SphereClient {
027    private final ApiHttpClient client;
028
029    private final String projectKey;
030
031    private final ObjectMapper mapper;
032
033    private final ExceptionMode exceptionMode;
034
035    private CompatSphereClient(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper, final String projectKey,
036            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
037        this.projectKey = projectKey;
038        this.mapper = mapper;
039        this.client = new CompatApiHttpClient(apiHttpClient, mapper);
040        this.exceptionMode = exceptionMode;
041    }
042
043    public ProjectApiRoot apiRoot() {
044        return ProjectApiRoot.fromClient(projectKey, client);
045    }
046
047    public ApiHttpClient getClient() {
048        return client;
049    }
050
051    public String getProjectKey() {
052        return projectKey;
053    }
054
055    public ExceptionMode getExceptionMode() {
056        return exceptionMode;
057    }
058
059    public ObjectMapper getMapper() {
060        return mapper;
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * creates an instance of the CompatSphereClient. Please be aware for backwards compatibility the v2 Exceptions are thrown
065     * @param clientConfig client configuration
066     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
067     */
068    public static CompatSphereClient of(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
069        return of(createDefaultClient(clientConfig), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), clientConfig.getProjectKey(),
070            ExceptionMode.SDK_V2);
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
075     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
076     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
077     */
078    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot) {
079        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), apiRoot.getProjectKey(),
080            ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
085     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
086     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
087     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
088     */
089    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ObjectMapper mapper) {
090        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), mapper, apiRoot.getProjectKey(), ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
095     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
096     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
097     */
098    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey) {
099        return of(apiHttpClient, SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), projectKey, ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
104     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
105     * @param projectKey the project key to be used
106     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
107     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
108     */
109    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper,
110            final String projectKey) {
111        return of(apiHttpClient, mapper, projectKey, ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
116     * @param clientConfig client configuration
117     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
118     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
119     */
120    public static CompatSphereClient of(SphereClientConfig clientConfig, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
121        return of(createDefaultClient(clientConfig), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), clientConfig.getProjectKey(),
122            exceptionMode);
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
127     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
128     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
129     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
130     */
131    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
132        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), apiRoot.getProjectKey(),
133            exceptionMode);
134    }
135
136    /**
137     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
138     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
139     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
140     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
141     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
142     */
143    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ObjectMapper mapper,
144            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
145        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), mapper, apiRoot.getProjectKey(), exceptionMode);
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
150     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
151     * @param projectKey project key to be used
152     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
153     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
154     */
155    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey,
156            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
157        return of(apiHttpClient, SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), projectKey, exceptionMode);
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
162     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
163     * @param projectKey the project key to be used
164     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
165     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
166     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
167     */
168    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper,
169            final String projectKey, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
170        return new CompatSphereClient(apiHttpClient, mapper, projectKey, exceptionMode);
171    }
172
173    private static ApiHttpClient createDefaultClient(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
174        final URI resolve = URI.create(clientConfig.getApiUrl()).resolve("/" + clientConfig.getProjectKey() + "/");
175        return ApiRootBuilder.of()
176                .defaultClient(resolve)
177                .addCorrelationIdProvider(() -> clientConfig.getCorrelationIdGenerator().get())
178                .withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials.of()
179                        .withClientId(clientConfig.getClientId())
180                        .withClientSecret(clientConfig.getClientSecret())
181                        .build(),
182                    URI.create(clientConfig.getAuthUrl()).resolve("/oauth/token"))
183                .buildClient();
184    }
185
186    @Override
187    public <T> CompletionStage<T> execute(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest) {
188        final CompatRequest<JsonNode> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, sphereRequest,
189            JsonNode.class);
190        final HttpRequest httpRequest = sphereRequest.httpRequestIntent().toHttpRequest(client.getBaseUri().toString());
191
192        if (exceptionMode == ExceptionMode.SDK_V2) {
193            return compatRequest.send()
194                    .thenApply(response -> HttpResponse.of(response.getStatusCode(), response.getBody(), httpRequest))
195                    .thenApplyAsync(sphereRequest::deserialize);
196        }
197        return compatRequest.send()
198                .thenApply(response -> HttpResponse.of(response.getStatusCode(), response.getBody(), httpRequest))
199                .thenApplyAsync(httpResponse -> {
200                    try {
201                        return sphereRequest.deserialize(httpResponse);
202                    }
203                    catch (final JsonException e) {
204                        final byte[] bytes = httpResponse.getResponseBody();
205                        e.addNote("Cannot parse " + bytesToString(bytes));
206                        throw e;
207                    }
208                })
209                .exceptionally((throwable) -> {
210                    Throwable cause = throwable.getCause();
211                    if (cause instanceof ApiHttpException) {
212                        ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> errorResponse = ((ApiHttpException) cause).getResponse();
213                        if (errorResponse != null) {
214                            HttpResponse httpResponse = HttpResponse.of(errorResponse.getStatusCode(),
215                                errorResponse.getBody(), httpRequest);
216                            Throwable e = createExceptionFor(httpResponse, sphereRequest, mapper, projectKey,
217                                httpRequest);
218                            throw new CompletionException(e);
219                        }
220                    }
221                    if (throwable instanceof CompletionException) {
222                        throw new CompletionException(cause);
223                    }
224                    throw new CompletionException(throwable);
225                });
226    }
227
228    public enum ExceptionMode {
229        SDK_V1, SDK_V2
230    }
231
232    private static <T> SphereException createExceptionFor(final HttpResponse httpResponse,
233            final SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest, final ObjectMapper objectMapper, final String projectKey,
234            final HttpRequest httpRequest) {
235        final SphereException sphereException = CompatExceptionFactory.of()
236                .createException(httpResponse, sphereRequest, objectMapper);
237        fillExceptionWithData(sphereRequest, httpResponse, sphereException, projectKey, httpRequest);
238        return sphereException;
239    }
240
241    private static <T> void fillExceptionWithData(final SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest, final HttpResponse httpResponse,
242            final SphereException exception, final String projectKey, final HttpRequest httpRequest) {
243        exception.setSphereRequest(sphereRequest);
244        exception.setUnderlyingHttpResponse(httpResponse);
245        exception.setProjectKey(projectKey);
246        exception.setHttpRequest(httpRequest);
247    }
248
249    private static String bytesToString(final byte[] b) {
250        return new String(b, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
251    }
252
253    @Override
254    protected void internalClose() {
255        closeQuietly(client);
256    }
257
258    @Override
259    public SphereApiConfig getConfig() {
260        return new SphereApiConfig() {
261            @Override
262            public String getApiUrl() {
263                return client.getBaseUri().toString();
264            }
265
266            @Override
267            public String getProjectKey() {
268                return projectKey;
269            }
270
271            @Override
272            public CorrelationIdGenerator getCorrelationIdGenerator() {
273                return null;
274            }
275        };
276    }
277
278    public static class CompatApiHttpClient extends AutoCloseableService implements ApiHttpClient {
279        private final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient;
280        private final ResponseSerializer serializer;
281
282        public CompatApiHttpClient(ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, ObjectMapper mapper) {
283            this.apiHttpClient = apiHttpClient;
284            this.serializer = ResponseSerializer.of(mapper);
285        }
286
287        @Override
288        public URI getBaseUri() {
289            return apiHttpClient.getBaseUri();
290        }
291
292        @Override
293        public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ClientRequestCommand<O> method) {
294            return method.execute(this);
295        }
296
297        @Override
298        public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ApiHttpRequest request,
299                final Class<O> outputType) {
300            return execute(request).thenApply(response -> serializer.convertResponse(response, outputType));
301        }
302
303        @Override
304        public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ApiHttpRequest request,
305                final TypeReference<O> outputType) {
306            return execute(request).thenApply(response -> serializer.convertResponse(response, outputType));
307        }
308
309        @Override
310        public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ApiHttpRequest request,
311                final JavaType outputType) {
312            return execute(request).thenApply(response -> serializer.convertResponse(response, outputType));
313        }
314
315        @Override
316        public ResponseSerializer getSerializerService() {
317            return serializer;
318        }
319
320        @Override
321        public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
322            return apiHttpClient.execute(request);
323        }
324
325        @Override
326        protected void internalClose() {
327            closeQuietly(apiHttpClient);
328        }
329    }
330}
